head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MITCHELL, JAMES S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MITCHELL, JAMES S.

block.p: MITCHELL-James S. 39 of, Colts Neck formerly of Montclair, Cedar Grove, Hoboken and Middletown on June 12. Husband of Patricia. Father of James Dawson Mitchell and Graham Mitchell. Son of James and Barbara Mitchell. Brother of David M. Mitchell, Donald H. Mitchell, and Janice M. Anania. Visitation Thursday 2-4 & 7-9 P.M. at the Holmdel Funeral Home, 26 S. Holmdel Rd. Holmdel, NJ. Funeral Service Friday 10 A.M. at Holmdel Funeral Home. Interment at Fairview Cemetery Middletown, NJ. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to James S. Mitchell Farmland Preservation Fund, 39 Rimwood Lane, Colts Neck, N J 07722.

MITCHELL-James S. 39 of, Colts Neck formerly of Montclair, Cedar Grove, Hoboken and Middletown on June 12. Husband of Patricia. Father of James Dawson Mitchell and Graham Mitchell. Holmdel, NJ. Funeral Service Friday 10 A.M. at Holmdel Funeral Home. Interment at Fairview Cemetery Middletown, NJ. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to James S. Mitchell Farmland Preservation Fund, 39 Rimwood Lane, Colts Neck, N J 07722.
